sentences: Olen tõlkinud selle teksti inglise keelest.
Tõlkinud on see tekst eesti keelde.
context: The word 'tõlkinud' is the past tense of the Estonian verb 'tõlkima', which means to translate or interpret something from one language to another. It is commonly used in sentences to describe the act of translation, such as translating a book or a text.
